name: Deep Team - LD48
description:
Dring Dring Dring !  The Deep Company is hiring !

Assemble the best dream team and try to reach the deepest level !

Recruitment intel

  •  The worker : Dig and extract ore that can be sell later
  •  The air guy : Help to control the temperature
  • The safety guy:  Help to up the safety level 
  • The manager : Prevent strikes 

Tips :

  • Try to handle the safety level, is the safety reach 0, the cave will collapse.
  • Try to control the temperature, a too high temperature will trigger strikes.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/deep-team
